model_answer: The answer is A: [00:00:54 - 00:01:50]. The screen first poses the question “What does ‘Maximum Tolerated Dose’ mean?” at 00:00:54, and the speaker begins explaining the term at 00:00:58. The “VEGAN Lifestyle” text appears on-screen at 00:00:59, and the right monitor shows a clip labeled “WELCOME TO THE END” at 00:01:07.

The correct answer is B: [00:05:17 - 00:06:07].
In the provided audio clip, the speaker mentions working with Dr. Lauren Gorman on an animal-rights/intersectionality documentary and providing instructions on how to order or download the film from maximumtolerateddose.org or YouTube. The screen shot also confirms that the title of the video is "VEGAN Lifestyle" and the website being visited is "MAXIMUM TOLERATED DOSE". These details match the description in option B, which indicates the time frame during which the speaker talks about working with Dr. Lauren Gorman and provides instructions for accessing the film.
